00024 #ifndef MAX
00025 #define MAX(a,b) (a > b ? a : b)
00026 #endif
00027 
00028 __global__ void testKernel(int val);
00029 
00030 int init_cuda(int argc, char **argv)
00031 {
00032     int devID;
00033     cudaDeviceProp props;
00034 
00035     // This will pick the best possible CUDA capable device
00036     devID = findCudaDevice(argc, (const char **)argv);
00037 
00038     //Get GPU information
00039     checkCudaErrors(cudaGetDevice(&devID));
00040     checkCudaErrors(cudaGetDeviceProperties(&props, devID));
00041     printf("Device %d: \"%s\" with Compute %d.%d capability\n",
00042            devID, props.name, props.major, props.minor);
00043 
00044     printf("printf() is called. Output:\n\n");
00045 
00046 
00047     return EXIT_SUCCESS;
00048 }
00049 
00050 int run_cuda( void )
00051 {
00052 
00053     //Kernel configuration, where a two-dimensional grid and
00054     //three-dimensional blocks are configured.
00055     dim3 dimGrid(1, 1);
00056     dim3 dimBlock(1, 1, 2);
00057     testKernel<<<dimGrid, dimBlock>>>(10);
00058     cudaDeviceSynchronize();
00059 
00060     return EXIT_SUCCESS;
00061 }
